name: timestamp-converter
title: Timestamp Converter
description: Convert between timestamp and datetime. Supports both seconds and milliseconds timestamp format.
author: hickey666

commands.name: convert-timestamp
commands.title: Convert Timestamp
commands.subtitle: Convert between timestamp and datetime
commands.description: A tool to convert between Unix timestamp and human readable datetime format

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
